thread.title: How Trump tweet on Pakistan blindsided U.S. officials

title: How Trump tweet on Pakistan blindsided U.S. officials
text:
How Trump tweet on Pakistan blindsided U.S. officials 4:07am IST - 02:12 
President Trump's abrupt announcement via Twitter on New Year's Day that he wanted to withhold security assistance to Pakistan left officials surprised and scrambling. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
President Trump's abrupt announcement via Twitter on New Year's Day that he wanted to withhold security assistance to Pakistan left officials surprised and scrambling. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2ARstyv
